However, when it comes to relaxing the mind, many individuals struggle and cannot seem to give the mind the relaxation it needs. Stop Overworking and Begin Overcoming! - By: Shakti Ravel - Narrated by: Cass Merry - Length: 3 hrs and 4 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story If you're not achieving everything you'd always hoped to, it's time to make a change: Live the life you really want. Employee surveys have found that 23 percent of workers feel burned out more often than they don't. This reflects a culture in which we must overwork ourselves to achieve our goals. Not only is this unnecessary, but it distracts us from understanding what our desires are in the first place. - - Manageable Time Limit - By Joseph Landrum on 06-17-21 By: [Shakti Ravel](/search?searchAuthor=Shakti+Ravel&ref=a_pd_Social_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_3_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=2370YY5D7EQTFAQ1767M&pageLoadId=ojtZUO4FYMcm50jw&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Relaxation Hypnosis for Happiness - 5 Guided Meditation Scripts to Relieve Stress, Anxiety, Worry and Improve Sleep, Mood, Well-Being - By: Shivani Batra - Narrated by: Chuck Galco - Length: 3 hrs - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story More than 300 million people in the world are affected by depression and depression-like symptoms. Are you one of them? Depression is one of the most common illnesses in the world, with people of all ages experiencing the burden it can bring into one's life. To make things worse, a great deal of doctors tend to prescribe pharmaceutical drugs as their quick-fix rather than treating the actual source of the issue. There's no need to worry, however, there are several alternative methods of treatment, natural treatment, one of them being meditation. - - Appropriate meditations for calmness and clarity - By Eric Be on 02-29-20 By: [Shivani Batra](/author/Shivani-Batra/B08599JGV3?ref=a_pd_Social_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_4_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=2370YY5D7EQTFAQ1767M&pageLoadId=ojtZUO4FYMcm50jw&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Guided Meditation for Living in the Moment - By: Lisa Rogers - Narrated by: L. B. Rose - Length: 1 hr and 8 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story If you want to learn how to relax, how to be happy, and how to practice mindfulness meditation - this audiobook will help you achieve that. - - Very Impressive Guided Meditation Session - By Samantha on 04-16-15 By: [Lisa Rogers](/search?searchAuthor=Lisa+Rogers&ref=a_pd_Social_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_5_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=2370YY5D7EQTFAQ1767M&pageLoadId=ojtZUO4FYMcm50jw&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Guided Imagery for Trauma - Self-Healing Meditations for Overthinking, Domestic Abuse, Grief, Bullying, PTSD, and Traumatic Childhood Experiences - By: Shivani Batra - Narrated by: Emerson Wolfe - Length: 3 hrs and 16 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story If you're suffering from a past traumatic experience, you've doubtless been presented with a number of possible treatments. Some of these might help, and others, not so much. And some of these treatments will be more involved and expensive than others. Surprisingly, one of the best places to start if you're looking for an alternative route is with guided therapeutic imagery. - - The Power and The Glory - By Melvin Torres on 07-16-21 By: [Shivani Batra](/author/Shivani-Batra/B08599JGV3?ref=a_pd_Social_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_6_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=2370YY5D7EQTFAQ1767M&pageLoadId=ojtZUO4FYMcm50jw&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) Publisher's summary This "Social Media Detox" program was designed to assist the listener in untangling from social media, creating a solid sense of self, and creating a beautiful life! Empowering thoughts create an empowered you! Expanding evolution, day & night meditations programs have been designed for those who wish to expand and evolve into increased personal success by exercising the power of focused perception and intention with positive thoughts, behaviors, and emotions. In addition, a daily practice of meditation has been known to provide many additional benefits, such as increased energy levels, health, happiness, optimism, peace, clarity, and self-control. Included you will find six meditations: three for use during the day and three for the evening, at bedtime, or while sleeping. Each meditation starts with a short guided induction to quiet your mind and thoughts before the goal-specific affirmations begin. The background music is different for each meditation to match your personal taste. Music provided by Christopher Lloyd Clarke: chapters five, six, and seven. Mastery over thoughts, feelings, and actions begin in the mind. It is through consistent practice and dedication that success can be achieved in any endeavor. That being said, this program is best used repeatedly, and often, until the desired effects have been achieved. Accomplish your goals, and create the life you've always wanted starting today!
